name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y <packages.txt; [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt; pip3 install --user streamlit; echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'

postAttachCommand.server: streamlit run トップ.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
